subject: Baseball
Discrimination
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ steadily dwindling crowds at Citi Field are the backdrop to a federal lawsuit filed last week by a former ticket sales executive accusing the team of discrimination.
snippet: The Mets’ steadily dwindling crowds at Citi Field are the backdrop to a federal lawsuit filed last week by a former ticket sales executive accusing the team of discrimination.
